li.desc: The solid stone core disintegrates upon impact, increasing damage. It is very heavy though, leading to increased recoil and reduced velocity.
The stone jacket shears and shatters upon impact, increasing damage. It won't be going through any armor though.
The stone tip fragments upon impact, increasing damage. The increased mass does have negative effects, however.
The casing is somehow made out of stone. This greatly reduces the cyclic rate and recoil, but adds mass.
